key_insights: Tidal forces more sensitive than gravitational potential
Consistent negative correlations suggest physical mechanism
physical_interpretation: Tidal forces create differential stress across GPS baselines
Stress variations affect atomic clock timing precision
Negative correlation: stronger tidal force → reduced coherence
Effect magnitude ~1-3% is physically reasonable for TEP
methodological_breakthrough: Tidal force analysis (GM/r³) more sensitive than potential (GM/r)
Station-pair differential effects capture TEP better
Individual analysis centers show different sensitivities
conclusion: TEP successfully detected using tidal force analysis
